title: Intrusion deception
extract: Reposting is not permitted without express written permission. Deception Techniques as Part of Intrusion. Detection Strategy. Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS) are used to help the Security Analyst detect unauthorized or suspicious activity inside a network and on Endpoints (servers, workstations).Mar 3, 2016
